import React from 'react' import Feedback from '../Feedback' function MultipleResults(props) { return
{props.feedback && } {props.feedback === null && props.characters === null && } {props.characters && props.characters.map(({id, name, path, extension}) =>
props.onCharacterSelected(id)} data-id={id} className="column cursor card is-one-third-widescreen is-two-fifths-tablet is-three-quarters-mobile has-text-centered">

{name}

)}
} export default MultipleResults
